column1: In case of problem, please report to:
<INFO name="service_protocol" value="ASU">  IVOID of the protocol through which the data was retrieved</INFO>
<INFO name="contact" value="cds-question@unistra.fr">  Email or URL to contact publisher</INFO>
<INFO name="publisher" value="CDS">  Data centre that produced the VOTable</INFO>

<DESCRIPTION>BlackCAT, stellar-mass BH in X-ray trans. (Corral-Santana+, 2016)</DESCRIPTION>  <INFO name="ivoid" value="ivo://cds.vizier/j/a+a/587/a61">    IVOID of underlying data collection  </INFO>
<INFO name="creator" value="Corral-Santana J.M.">    First author or institution  </INFO>
<INFO name="cites" value="bibcode:2016A&A...587A..61C">    Article or Data origin sources  </INFO>
<INFO name="editor" value="Astronomy and Astrophysics">    Editor name (article)  </INFO>
<INFO name="original_date" value="2016">    Year of the article publication  </INFO>
<INFO name="citation" value="doi:10.26093/cds/vizier.35870061">    Dataset identifier that can be used for citation  </INFO>
<INFO name="publication_date" value="2017-12-22">    Date of first publication in the data centre  </INFO>
<DESCRIPTION>Dynamical parameters of the sample of dynamical black holes</DESCRIPTION>
<!-- +++No column could be found to attach a LINK in table: J/A+A/587/A61/tablea4 -->
<DESCRIPTION>MK spectral type of the companion star</DESCRIPTION>
<FIELD name="Porb" ucd="time.period" datatype="double" width="11" precision="7" unit="h"><!-- ucd="TIME_PERIOD" -->
<FIELD name="e_Porb" ucd="stat.error" datatype="double" width="10" precision="7" unit="h"><!-- ucd="ERROR" -->
<FIELD name="K2" ucd="spect.dopplerVeloc" datatype="float" width="5" precision="1" unit="km/s"><!-- ucd="ORBIT_RV_S-AMPLITUDE" -->
<FIELD name="e_K2" ucd="stat.error" datatype="float" width="4" precision="1" unit="km/s"><!-- ucd="ERROR" -->
<FIELD name="f(M1)" ucd="phys.mass" datatype="float" width="5" precision="2" unit="solMass"><!-- ucd="PHYS_MASS_FUNCTION" -->
<FIELD name="e_f(M1)" ucd="stat.error" datatype="float" width="5" precision="2" unit="solMass"><!-- ucd="ERROR" -->
<FIELD name="M1" ucd="phys.mass" datatype="float" width="5" precision="2" unit="solMass"><!-- ucd="PHYS_MASS_MISC" -->
<FIELD name="E_M1" ucd="stat.error;stat.max" datatype="float" width="4" precision="1" unit="solMass"><!-- ucd="ERROR" -->
<FIELD name="e_M1" ucd="stat.error" datatype="float" width="4" precision="1" unit="solMass"><!-- ucd="ERROR" -->
<FIELD name="M1u" ucd="phys.mass" datatype="float" width="4" precision="1" unit="solMass"><!-- ucd="PHYS_MASS_MISC" -->
<FIELD name="q" ucd="phys.mass" datatype="float" width="6" precision="3"><!-- ucd="PHYS_MASS_RATIO" -->
<FIELD name="E_q" ucd="stat.error;stat.max" datatype="float" width="6" precision="3"><!-- ucd="ERROR" -->
<FIELD name="e_q" ucd="stat.error" datatype="float" width="6" precision="3"><!-- ucd="ERROR" -->
<FIELD name="qu" ucd="phys.mass;arith.ratio" datatype="float" width="6" precision="3"><!-- ucd="PHYS_MASS_RATIO" -->
<FIELD name="i" ucd="src.orbital.inclination;pos.posAng" datatype="float" width="4" precision="1" unit="deg"><!-- ucd="POS_INCLIN_LOS" -->
<FIELD name="e_i" ucd="stat.error" datatype="float" width="4" precision="1" unit="deg"><!-- ucd="ERROR" -->
<FIELD name="iu" ucd="src.orbital.inclination" datatype="short" width="2" unit="deg"><!-- ucd="POS_INCLIN_LOS" -->
<FIELD name="vrotsini" ucd="phys.veloc.rotat" datatype="float" width="5" precision="1" unit="km/s"><!-- ucd="VELOC_ROTAT" -->
<FIELD name="E_vrotsini" ucd="stat.error;stat.max" datatype="float" width="4" precision="1" unit="km/s"><!-- ucd="ERROR" -->
<FIELD name="e_vrotsini" ucd="stat.error" datatype="float" width="4" precision="1" unit="km/s"><!-- ucd="ERROR" -->
<INFO name="Warning" value="skip recno in all column selection"/>
